name: Paul S. Piper
bio: Paul S. Piper's most recent book of poems is Dogs and Other Poems (Bird Dog Publishing, 2011). His work has appeared in the anthologies The New Montana Story, Tribute to Orpheus, America Zen, and Shadow and Light.  He has also co-edited the books Father Nature and X-Stories: The Personal Side of Fragile X Syndrome. Piper lives in Washington, where he works as a librarian at Western Washington University.
